text: Okrzeszyn () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawka, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. It lies approximately south of Lubawka, south of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 278. ==References== Okrzeszyn
title: Okrzeszyn, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
